sequence.message: 'ACI: Effective Rights: Preamble - Removing Search Global ACI'
sequence.script: allow_aci='(targetcontrol=\"*\") (version 3.0; acl \"allow control access\"; allow(read) userdn=\"ldap:///anyone\";)'

'ACI: Effective Rights: Basic - wildcard, user searching targeted entry'
